title: House Cleaner
description: Clean a 2-bedroom house including kitchen and bathroom.

title: Laundry Assistant
description: Wash, dry, and iron clothes for a family of four.

title: Nanny
description: Look after 2 children (ages 4 and 7) for 6 hours.

title: Painter
description: Paint the living room walls and ceiling with provided paint.

title: Gardener
description: Trim grass, water plants, and clean the yard.

title: Car Washer
description: Wash and vacuum 2 family cars inside and out.

title: Mover
description: Help carry and load furniture into a moving truck.

title: Dishwasher
description: Wash dishes and clean kitchen for a small restaurant.

title: Dog Walker
description: Walk two dogs around the neighborhood for 1 hour.

title: Street Vendor Helper
description: Assist with setting up and packing a small street food stall.

title: Security Guard
description: Provide overnight security for a small event.

title: Delivery Helper
description: Assist in delivering groceries in the neighborhood.
